title: Generous Soul

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give a player a gift at night.
- Construct a gift for a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may give a player a tangible item that any other role in the GIM thread can give. You are not given a list of items - it is up to you to do research on what items are available to give out.
- If you must construct a certain item in order to give it out, such as a Trapper's trap, you must spend as much time doing so as needed. You may not construct a gift and give one in the same night.
- You cannot give out multiple items from the same role.
- You act compulsively. If you do not submit an action, the host will choose a random role that can give out items and give an item to a random player.

desc:
Post 2575
*Take that! And that! And that! And that!*
